casebody.data:
In the Matter of Robert M. Morgenthau, as District Attorney óf New York County, Respondent, v Bobby 9X Hopes, Appellant. In the Matter of Robert M. Morgenthau, as District Attorney of New York County, Petitioner, v James J. Leff, as a Justice of the Supreme Court of the State of New York, Respondent. Submitted March 7, 1977; decided April 7, 1977

Reported below, 55 AD2d 255.

Motion for leave to appeal dismissed upon the ground that the order sought to be appealed from was made in a criminal proceeding and no appeal lies therefrom under the Criminal Procedure Law.
